Plot: A teenager suspects that his new neighbor is a vampire.
Title: Fright Night
Writer: Marti Noxon (screenplay), Tom Holland (story), Tom Holland (film "Fright Night")
Actors: Anton Yelchin, Colin Farrell, Toni Collette, David Tennant
tomatoConsensus: It may not have been necessary to remake the 1985 cult classic, but the new Fright Night benefits from terrific performances by Colin Farrell and David Tennant -- and it's smart, funny, and stylishly gory to boot.
